name: Detective Glub in The Berry Files - Playtest Release
name_original: Detective Glub in The Berry Files - Playtest Release
description:
Detective Glub in The Berry Files

A university project created by 14 students

This version of the game is currently our Playtest Release.  Therefore some features are currently in-development and unfinished.  We're eagerly looking for any constructive feedback! Please fill out our survey below after giving our game a try:

https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLScOWEn68zYi352zH30J7okqNIw95ydqQmTnCACZcQJ9Ed7p7g/viewform?usp=sharing

Quick tips: 

- Takes a little while to start up (so if you're waiting on a black screen, that's okay!)
